text: Va monandn on zan, ki ristaero, ki mahkam tofta ʙud, az ham kusud va qit'a-qit'a kard, maʙosed, to savgandhoi xudro vasilai fireʙi jakdigar sozed, ʙa in ʙahona, ki guruhe ʙestar az guruhi digar ast. Xudo sumoro ʙa on meozmojad va dar ruzi qijomat cizero, ki dar on ixtilof mekarded, ʙarojaton ʙajon mekunad
